price: 51 qui, nous l’espérons, nous pardonnera nos péchés pour avoir été les premiers à embrasser la foi. »
arabic: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innā naṭmaʿu an yaghfira lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā an kunnā awwala al-mu'minīna
